1.0.name: wordpress/blogroll-in-posts
1.0.description: Ever want to use your blogroll in your pages or posts? Ever wanted to show a list of links in a category without editing your templates or using a sidebar widget? Now you can! Easily add and customize a link list with this easy to use plugin. Simply add the [blogroll] shortcode to your pages or posts and it will automatically convert into a full fledged blogroll!
